sentences.en: A good name keeps its luster in the dark.
sentences.cn: 美誉在黑暗中亦能保持其光辉.

sentences.en: And it can significantly increase luster , decontaminate and anti - electrostatic.
sentences.cn: 并带有一定的芬芳气味.

sentences.en: And some minutely crystalline varieties, such as flint, may be opaque and of a maxy luster.
sentences.cn: 某些细小的结晶变种, 如燧石, 可能是不透明的,并具有油脂光泽.

sentences.en: And some minutely crystalline varieties, such as flint, may be opaque and of a waxy luster.
sentences.cn: 某些细小的结晶变种, 如燧石, 可能是不透明的,并具有腊样的光泽.

sentences.en: College graduates may be losing some of their luster for reasons beyond technology and trade.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业生也许会因为技术和贸易之外的原因失去一些光彩。

sentences.en: Crystal to raise living atmosphere, refraction fantastic luster, it is warm.
sentences.cn: 水晶能够提升生活氛围, 折射梦幻般的光泽, 令人感到温暖.

sentences.en: Flowering to do and it leaves lost its luster silver, brown the.
sentences.cn: 花期尽了,它的叶子失去了银色的光泽, 枯黄了.

sentences.en: His great books have added luster to the university where he teaches.
sentences.cn: 他的巨著给他任教的大学增了光.

sentences.en: No one knows for sure when the tide started to turn, or the exact moment when American gold started its slow but seemingly irreversible loss of luster.
sentences.cn: 无人确切知晓这波潮汐的消退始于何时，也没有人精确的得知美金的光泽从何时起开始缓慢，但不可逆转的褪色。

sentences.en: Our products feature fine craftsmanship , good flexibility and luster, durability and quality consistency.
sentences.cn: 产品具有:工艺精细、弯曲度好、光泽度好 、 坚固耐用、质量稳定等特点.

sentences.en: That luster has taken a fancy to Middle Eastern dancing.
sentences.cn: 那个好色之徒现在开始喜欢看肚皮舞.

sentences.en: The childishness of juvenile had just faded from his face and the adolescent luster of his age had not been coruscating due to apparent malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 脸上看来才刚刚褪掉少年的稚气——显然由于营养不良，还没有焕发出他这种年龄所特有的那种青春光彩。

sentences.en: The Conductive Luster Pearl is anti - static and highly heat - conductive.
sentences.cn: 导电珠光具有抗静电 高能 导热效果.

sentences.en: The European - style new furniture adds luster to your new room.
sentences.cn: 欧陆款式新潮家具,令您新居增辉.

sentences.en: The experimental results show the good chemical durability of the luster film.
sentences.cn: 耐酸、耐碱失重试验表明,该虹彩膜具有很好的化学稳定性.

sentences.en: The modern paint adds luster to the walls of your new home.
sentences.cn: 新型涂料,令您新居四壁增辉.

sentences.en: The original purpose of mercerization was to improve the luster of cotton fibers.
sentences.cn: 丝光的本来目的是改善棉丝维的光泽.

sentences.en: Then it’s really no more than a means of transportation, it too loses its luster.
sentences.cn: 然后它就仅仅是一个名符其实的交通工具，失去了它的光彩。

sentences.en: This adds more luster to your hair than any other brand.
sentences.cn: 这种洗发精比任何一种别的牌子更能增加你头发的光泽.

sentences.en: Towards evening, the sun from the clouds like scale again put a painting like luster.
sentences.cn: 临近傍晚，阳光从鱼鳞般的云层中一次次投放出油画般的光彩。

sentences.en: Turning turning, and we go to the garment district, one of my eyes saw the clothes release luster, so I immediately plunged into the sea of clothing.
sentences.cn: 转着转着，我们转到了服装区，一看见衣服我的眼睛就放出光彩，于是我立刻钻进衣服的海洋里。

words.tran_cn: 表面有金属光泽的陶瓷器
